thread.title: David Walliams and Susanna Reid kick off the Spectre premiere in 007 style
thread.title_full: David Walliams and Susanna Reid kick off the Spectre premiere in 007 style

title: David Walliams and Susanna Reid kick off the Spectre premiere in 007 style
text:
David Walliams and Susanna Reid kick off the Spectre premiere in 007 style David Walliams and Susanna Reid kick off the Spectre premiere in 007 style 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Watch out James Bond, it looks like David Walliams and Susanna Reid might be trying to steal your wheels. 
— David Walliams (@davidwalliams) October 26, 2015 
They slipped into one of James Bond’s cars to arrive in style at the world premiere of Spectre. 
The stylish duo arrived in the silver 1951 Rolls Royce from the movie, which is featured as Bond (Daniel Craig) drives through the Sahara desert. The view from London’s Royal Albert Hall for the Spectre premiere (Matt Crossick/PA) 
“What a way to arrive,” said Walliams, adding that Spectre is “bigger and better” than its predecessor, Skyfall. Off to the #Bond premiere tonight! Very excited about this -I'm a HUGE Bond fan! 😃😃😃 
— Dr Christian Jessen (@DoctorChristian) October 26, 2015 Share article 
Walliams, Reid and Rick Edwards are hosting the red carpet coverage and will be interviewing all of the big stars, including Craig. Promoted Stories
